product_name: Sea to Summit Trek and Travel Laundry Wash - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Keep your clothes clean while traveling the world with the Sea To Summit Trek and Travel laundry wash. Concentrated formula requires only about 2 caps full of detergent for an average load of washing. Soap is biodegradable and phosphate free. Suitable for use in fresh and saltwater. Soap has a light green tea fragrance. Compliant with TSA carry-on luggage regulations.
short_description: Keep your clothes clean while traveling the world with the Sea To Summit Trek and Travel laundry wash.
